text: â€œE iwe Mneneri! Alimbikitse okhulupirira kupita ku nkhondo. Ngati mwa inu muli anthu makumi awiri olimba mtima (ndiye kuti) adzawagonjetsa mazana awiri (a mwa anthu osakhulupirira). Ngati mwa inu muli anthu zana limodzi (olimba mtima ndiye kuti) adzagonjetsa chikwi chimodzi (1,000) cha anthu omwe sadakhulupirire, chifukwa chakuti iwo ndi anthu osazindikira
